title: Report a Sighting
subtitle: Have you seen someone who might be missing? Your report could help reunite them with their family.
heroTitle: Your Observation Could Save a Life
heroDescription: If you've seen someone who appears lost, confused, or matches a missing person report, please share the details below. Every piece of information matters.

photos.title: Photos of the Person
photos.description: Upload clear photos of the person you've seen (up to 5 photos)

location.title: Sighting Location
location.description: Where did you see this person? Mark the location on the map or describe it

personDetails.title: Person's Name
personDetails.description: Did they tell you their name? This information is crucial for identification!
personDetails.importanceNote: If the person mentioned their name, please provide it - it greatly helps in matching with missing person reports

contact.title: Your Contact Information
contact.description: So we can follow up with you about the sighting

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: Any other details about your encounter or conversation

fields.mapHint: Click on the map to mark where you saw the person. You can drag the marker to adjust.
fields.mapMobileHint: Use two fingers to move the map

placeholders.locationDescription: e.g., Near the central market on Mohammed V street
placeholders.firstName: Enter first name if they told you
placeholders.lastName: Enter last name if they told you
placeholders.additionalInfo: Describe your encounter with this person. Did they say anything? How did they appear? Were they alone or with someone? Any distinguishing features you noticed?

errors.maxPhotos: You can upload a maximum of 5 photos
errors.photoRequired: Please upload at least one photo of the person you've seen
errors.phoneRequired: Phone number is required so we can contact you
errors.locationRequired: Please provide the city and location description
errors.submitFailed: Failed to submit the report. Please try again.
errors.legalConfirmationRequired: You must confirm the above statement to submit the report.

validation.photo: At least one photo is required
validation.legalConfirmation: You must agree to the legal confirmation

success.reportSubmitted: Thank you! Your sighting report has been submitted successfully. We will review it and contact you if needed.

reward.title: üéÅ Potential Reward
reward.description: If your sighting report helps reunite a missing person with their family, and the photo you uploaded matches a wanted person, you may be eligible to receive a reward. Your contribution could make a real difference!

legalConfirmation: I confirm that the information provided is true and that providing information about people who are not missing, for the purpose of defamation or any other reason, is prohibited and may expose me to legal action.
